text: Comcast Center is a skyscraper in Philadelphia, United States. It is 297 meters (974 feet) tall and has 82 floors. It was built in 1999 and is one of the tallest buildings in the United States. ==Related pages== * List of tallest buildings in the United States * List of tallest buildings in the world ==Other websites== * Emporis.com - Comcast Center * SkycraperPage.com â€“ Comcast Center Category:Skyscrapers in the United States Category:Buildings and structures in Philadelphia
title: Comcast Center
